data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

I am humbled to share that I've completed 15 incredible years of my professional journey at Oracle India today. A journey that has helped me collate memorable experiences, geared me up to face challenges, and along the way given me tremendous growth. The joy of building the organisation with close partnership with various business leaders has been very enriching. Huge thanks to my amazing colleagues, managers, my team, mentors, family and friends for their infallible support. Over these years what I have realized and consistently reflect on is alignment of one’s performance to the purpose means aligning the actions with a deeper sense of meaning or mission, creating a connection between what you do and your core identity. Balancing performance and identity through purpose can lead to a more fulfilling and meaningful professional journey.
